body:
Is there a necessity to name each input for a group? Otherwise all the explicit indexing could be avoided:
```
input_parts = tf.split(inputs, self._number_of_groups)
m_prev_parts = tf.split(m_prev, self._number_of_groups)
for group_id, (input_part, m_prev_part) in enumerate(zip(input_parts, m_prev_parts)):
...
```
